H0.text: who is the designer in devil wears prada. Oscar de la Renta

H1.text: who is the designer in devil wears prada. Karl Lagerfeld

H2.text: who is the designer in devil wears prada. Giorgio Armani

H3.text: who is the designer in devil wears prada. Valentino Garavani

A4.text: Óscar Arístides de la Renta y Fiallo (22 July 1932 – 20 October 2014), known professionally as Óscar de la Renta, was a Dominican fashion designer.

A5.text: He became internationally known in the 1960s as one of the couturiers who dressed Jacqueline Kennedy.
